articles.author: Leo Sands
articles.title: U.S. influencer snatches baby wombat from its mom. Cue Australian ire. - The Washington Post
articles.description: Widely shared video of the woman holding the baby wombat prompted Australian authorities to open an investigation into her visa status.
articles.content: An American influencer who was filmed snatching a baby wombat from its mother has sparked deep upset in Australia, prompting an investigation by immigration authorities into her visa status, ire from… [+4488 chars]
